titles.title: Individual Privacy Protection Act of 1989
A bill to amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to reduce the period of time that certain adverse information is retained in consumer credit files.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Consumer Affairs and Coinage.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Fair Credit Reporting Act to prohibit a consumer report by a consumer reporting agency from containing certain adverse information which antedates the report by more than four (currently seven) years.
